TopicTitle: Can we get a Tilt Meter mod?

Articles.Content: I need a tilt meter so I know if im on level ground for my base building.
How would it be different from just using the navball?

KER has a slope readout, which you can use in flight to scout good locations.  Then perhaps drive a rover around with a more precise readout than you could spot by eye on the navball.  Then plant a survey flag and return with your base components...
what about kerbnet and scansat. if you want live - then scansat instrument panel IIRC will show slope.
